welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Geisenfeld, Germany! Known for its charming streets and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and embrace its unique culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
